results.definition: a small waterfall or series of small waterfalls
a succession of stages or operations or processes or units
examples: progressing in severity as though a cascade of genetic damage was occurring
separation of isotopes by a cascade of processes

results.definition: a sudden downpour (as of tears or sparks etc) likened to a rain shower
examples: a little shower of rose petals

results.definition: rush down in big quantities, like a cascade
arrange (open windows) on a computer desktop so that they overlap each other, with the title bars visible
